events.description: The release of industrial production data for Argentina showing a year-on-year decline in December 2025.

facts.fact_text: Argentina's industrial production fell 3.9% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Argentina’s industrial production fell 3.9% year-on-year in December 2025

facts.fact_text: Industrial production in Argentina contracted by 8.7% in November.
Ten out of sixteen manufacturing divisions in Argentina recorded annual declines in December.

evidences.evidence_text: Ten of the sixteen manufacturing divisions recorded annual declines.

facts.fact_text: The motor vehicles, bodies, trailers and auto parts sector saw a decline of 21.6%.

evidences.evidence_text: the steepest drops were seen in motor vehicles, bodies, trailers and auto parts (-21.6%)

claims.claim_text: Argentina's industrial sector is experiencing a prolonged period of contraction.

evidences.evidence_text: Argentina’s Industrial Production Extends Decline in December

evidence.evidence_text: Argentina’s industrial production fell 3.9% year-on-year in December 2025

links.source_ref: motor vehicles, bodies, trailers and auto parts

evidence.evidence_text: By impact on the overall index, the steepest drops were seen in motor vehicles, bodies, trailers and auto parts (-21.6%)
Meanwhile, positive contributions came from basic metal industries (7.4%)
